Uses of Package
com.linecorp.armeria.common

  • Packages that use com.linecorp.armeria.common 
    Package Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client
    Client core.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker
    Failure detection and fallback mechanism based on circuit breaker pattern.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.http
    Simple HTTP client.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.limit
    Limits the number of executed Requests.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.logging
    Logging and metric-collecting client decorators.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.pool
    Asynchronous Channel pool.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.thrift
    Thrift client.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.tracing
    Distributed tracing clients based on Brave, a Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common
    Common types.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.http
    HTTP-related classes.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging
    Common types used for collecting the information about Requests and Responses.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.thrift
    Thrift-related utility classes.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util
    Generic utility classes.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server
    Server core.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition
    Service composition.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging
    Logging and metric-collecting service decorators.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift
    Thrift service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.tracing
    Distributed tracing services based on Brave, a Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin.
  • Classes in com.linecorp.armeria.common used by com.linecorp.armeria.client 
    Class and Description
    AbstractRequestContext
    A skeletal RequestContext implementation.
    NonWrappingRequestContext
    Default RequestContext implementation.
    Request
    A request.
    RequestContext
    Provides information about a Request, its Response and related utilities.
    RequestContextWrapper
    Wraps an existing RequestContext.
    Response
    A response stream or a holder of the future result value.
    Scheme
    A pair of SerializationFormat and SessionProtocol.
    SessionProtocol
    Session-level protocol that provides facilities such as framing and flow control.
    TimeoutException
    A RuntimeException that is raised when a requested invocation did not complete before its deadline.

    A skeletal RequestContext implementation.

    A RuntimeException raised when the connection to the remote peer has been closed unexpectedly.

    A RuntimeException raised when the length of request or response content exceeds its limit.
